memberdef.name: lv_draw_polygon

detaileddescription.para:
Draw a polygon from triangles. Only convex polygons are supported
points
an array of points
point_cnt
number of points
mask
polygon will be drawn only in this mask
style
style of the polygon
opa_scale
scale down all opacities by the factor (0..255)
